title: An exhortation to peace and union in a sermon preached at St. Lawrence-Jury, on Tuesday the 26th of Novemb. 1689 / by ... Gilbert, Lord Bishop of Sarum.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: Half title: The Bishop of Salisbury's sermon of peace and union.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
